meanings.definition: A group of people working together, especially one that operates a vehicle or machine.
meanings.sent1: The crew on the ship worked together to steer it safely through the storm.
meanings.sent2: The film crew set up their equipment to start shooting the movie.
meanings.sent3: The crew of friends organized a surprise party for Sarah's birthday.
meanings.sent4: The crew of firefighters battled the blaze with determination and teamwork.
meanings.sent5: The crew of astronauts embarked on a mission to explore outer space.

meanings.definition: To serve as a member of a crew.
meanings.sent1: I crewed on a fishing boat during the summer to earn some extra money.
meanings.sent2: She crews on weekends at the local sailing club.
meanings.sent3: He crews on the rowing team and enjoys the camaraderie with his teammates.
meanings.sent4: They crewed together on the project, finishing it ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent5: We crewed on the hot air balloon, soaring high above the countryside.
